content: {"Title":"Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes with Maple Syrup","Description":"A classic breakfast favorite with bursts of fresh blueberries","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"25 minutes","Notes":"For extra fluffiness, let the batter rest for 5 minutes before cooking","Ingredients":["1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour","3 1/2 tsp baking powder","1/4 tsp salt","1 tbsp sugar","1 1/4 cups milk","1 egg","3 tbsp melted butter","1 cup fresh blueberries","Maple syrup for serving"],"Directions":["Mix dry ingredients in a bowl","In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter","Combine wet and dry ingredients, stirring until just mixed","Fold in blueberries","Heat a griddle or non-stick pan over medium heat","Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake","Cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook other side","Serve warm with maple syrup"]}
{"indexTitle":"Blueberry Pancakes","aliases":["Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes with Maple Syrup","Blueberry Pancakes","Breakfast Pancakes","Fruit Pancakes","Classic Pancakes"]}

{"Title":"Savory Spinach and Feta Quiche","Description":"A delicious brunch dish perfect for entertaining","Servings":"8","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 5 minutes","Notes":"Can be served hot or at room temperature","Ingredients":["1 pre-made pie crust","6 large eggs","1 cup heavy cream","2 cups fresh spinach, chopped","1 cup crumbled feta cheese","1/2 cup red onion, diced","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp olive oil","Salt and pepper to taste","Pinch of nutmeg"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)","Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until softened","Add spinach and cook until wilted","In a bowl, whisk eggs, cream, salt, pepper, and nutmeg","Spread spinach mixture in the pie crust","Sprinkle feta cheese over spinach","Pour egg mixture over the top","Bake for 45 minutes or until set and golden brown","Let cool for 10 minutes before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Spinach Quiche","aliases":["Savory Spinach and Feta Quiche","Spinach Quiche","Feta Quiche","Brunch Quiche","Vegetarian Quiche"]}

{"Title":"Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap","Description":"A portable and healthy lunch option","Servings":"2","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"25 minutes","Notes":"For a vegetarian option, substitute grilled chicken with grilled tofu","Ingredients":["2 large flour tortillas","2 grilled chicken breasts, sliced","2 cups romaine lettuce, chopped","1/4 cup Caesar dressing","1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, grated","2 tbsp sun-dried tomatoes, chopped","1 tsp garlic powder","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["In a bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing","Warm tortillas in a pan or microwave","Lay tortillas flat and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese","Add dressed lettuce, sliced chicken, and sun-dried tomatoes","Sprinkle with garlic powder, salt, and pepper","Roll tightly, tucking in the sides","Cut in half diagonally and serve"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chicken Caesar Wrap","aliases":["Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap","Chicken Caesar Wrap","Caesar Salad Wrap","Chicken Wrap","Lunch Wrap"]}

{"Title":"One-Pot Creamy Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Description":"A comforting and easy weeknight dinner","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"35 minutes","Notes":"For a lighter version, use half-and-half instead of heavy cream","Ingredients":["1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces","8 oz fettuccine pasta","2 cups chicken broth","1 cup heavy cream","1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped","2 cups fresh spinach","1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, grated","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp dried Italian herbs","2 tbsp olive oil","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat","Add chicken and cook until browned","Add garlic and Italian herbs, cook for 1 minute","Add pasta, chicken broth, and cream to the pot","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes","Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, spinach, and Parmesan cheese","Cook until spinach is wilted and pasta is al dente","Season with salt and pepper","Serve hot, garnished with extra Parmesan if desired"]}
{"indexTitle":"Tuscan Chicken Pasta","aliases":["One-Pot Creamy Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Creamy Chicken Pasta","One-Pot Pasta","Italian Chicken Pasta"]}

{"Title":"Decadent Double Chocolate Brownies","Description":"Rich, fudgy brownies perfect for chocolate lovers","Servings":"16","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"30 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"For extra indulgence, serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream","Ingredients":["1 cup unsalted butter","2 cups granulated sugar","4 large eggs","2 tsp vanilla extract","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder","1 cup all-purpose flour","1/2 tsp salt","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a 9x13 inch pan with parchment paper","Melt butter in a large microwave-safe bowl","Stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla until well combined","Add cocoa powder, flour, and salt, mix until just combined","Fold in chocolate chips","Pour batter into prepared pan and spread evenly","Bake for 25-30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted comes out with a few moist crumbs","Let cool in the pan before cutting into squares"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chocolate Brownies","aliases":["Decadent Double Chocolate Brownies","Chocolate Brownies","Fudgy Brownies","Double Chocolate Dessert","Homemade Brownies"]}

{"Title":"Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes with Maple Syrup","Description":"A classic breakfast favorite packed with juicy blueberries","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"25 minutes","Notes":"For extra fluffy pancakes, let the batter rest for 5 minutes before cooking","Ingredients":["1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour","3 1/2 teaspoons baking powder","1/4 teaspoon salt","1 tablespoon sugar","1 1/4 cups milk","1 egg","3 tablespoons melted butter","1 cup fresh blueberries","Maple syrup for serving"],"Directions":["In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar","In another bowl, mix milk, egg, and melted butter","Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until just combined","Fold in blueberries","Heat a griddle or pan over medium heat","Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake","Cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook other side","Serve warm with maple syrup"]}
{"indexTitle":"Blueberry Pancakes","aliases":["Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes with Maple Syrup","Blueberry Pancakes","Fruit Pancakes","Breakfast Pancakes","Homemade Pancakes"]}

{"Title":"Savory Mediterranean Brunch Shakshuka","Description":"A hearty one-pan egg dish perfect for a lazy weekend brunch","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"40 minutes","Notes":"Serve with crusty bread for dipping","Ingredients":["6 eggs","1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes","1 red bell pepper, diced","1 onion, chopped","3 cloves garlic, minced","2 tablespoons olive oil","1 teaspoon cumin","1 teaspoon paprika","1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper","Salt and pepper to taste","1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese","Fresh parsley for garnish"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat","Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened","Add garlic and spices, cook for 1 minute","Pour in diced tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes","Make 6 wells in the sauce and crack an egg into each","Cover and cook until egg whites are set but yolks are still runny","Sprinkle with feta cheese and parsley","Serve hot with crusty bread"]}
{"indexTitle":"Shakshuka","aliases":["Savory Mediterranean Brunch Shakshuka","Shakshuka","Mediterranean Eggs","Tomato Egg Skillet","Middle Eastern Brunch Dish"]}

{"Title":"Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap with Homemade Dressing","Description":"A portable and delicious twist on the classic Caesar salad","Servings":"2","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"30 minutes","Notes":"For a vegetarian option, substitute grilled chicken with grilled portobello mushrooms","Ingredients":["2 large flour tortillas","2 grilled chicken breasts, sliced","2 cups romaine lettuce, chopped","1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, grated","For the dressing: 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1 clove garlic (minced), 2 anchovy fillets (minced), salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["Whisk all dressing ingredients together in a bowl","Toss chopped romaine with half the dressing and Parmesan cheese","Warm tortillas slightly to make them pliable","Place dressed lettuce in the center of each tortilla","Top with sliced grilled chicken","Drizzle remaining dressing over chicken","Roll up tightly, tucking in the sides","Cut in half diagonally and serve"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chicken Caesar Wrap","aliases":["Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap with Homemade Dressing","Chicken Caesar Wrap","Caesar Salad Wrap","Grilled Chicken Wrap","Lunch Wrap"]}

{"Title":"One-Pot Creamy Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Description":"A comforting and easy weeknight dinner with Italian flair","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"40 minutes","Notes":"For a lighter version, use half-and-half instead of heavy cream","Ingredients":["1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces","8 oz penne pasta","1 cup heavy cream","1 cup chicken broth","2 cups baby spinach","1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped","1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tablespoon Italian seasoning","2 tablespoons olive oil","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat","Add chicken and cook until browned","Add garlic and Italian seasoning, cook for 1 minute","Pour in chicken broth and cream, bring to a simmer","Add pasta and cook until al dente, stirring occasionally","Stir in spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, and Parmesan cheese","Cook until spinach is wilted and sauce is thickened","Season with salt and pepper","Serve hot, garnished with extra Parmesan if desired"]}
{"indexTitle":"Tuscan Chicken Pasta","aliases":["One-Pot Creamy Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Tuscan Chicken Pasta","Creamy Chicken Pasta","Italian Chicken Pasta","One-Pot Pasta Dinner"]}

{"Title":"Decadent Dark Chocolate Lava Cakes","Description":"A rich and indulgent dessert with a gooey chocolate center","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"12 minutes","TotalTime":"27 minutes","Notes":"Serve immediately for the best molten center effect","Ingredients":["4 oz dark chocolate, chopped","1/2 cup unsalted butter","1 cup powdered sugar","2 whole eggs","2 egg yolks","6 tablespoons all-purpose flour","1/4 teaspoon salt","1 teaspoon vanilla extract","Butter and cocoa powder for ramekins","Vanilla ice cream or whipped cream for serving (optional)"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)","Butter and dust 4 ramekins with cocoa powder","Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler","Whisk in powdered sugar until smooth","Add eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla, mix well","Fold in flour and salt","Pour batter into prepared ramekins","Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are firm but center is soft","Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates","Serve immediately, optionally with ice cream or whipped cream"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chocolate Lava Cakes","aliases":["Decadent Dark Chocolate Lava Cakes","Chocolate Lava Cakes","Molten Chocolate Cakes","Chocolate Fondant","Individual Chocolate Desserts"]}

{"Title":"Crispy Baked Zucchini Chips with Ranch Dip","Description":"A healthy, crunchy snack alternative","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"40 minutes","Notes":"For extra crispiness, avoid overlapping zucchini slices on the baking sheet","Ingredients":["2 medium zucchini","2 tbsp olive oil","1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese","1/2 cup breadcrumbs","1 tsp garlic powder","1 tsp dried oregano","Salt and pepper to taste","1/2 cup Greek yogurt","1 tbsp ranch seasoning mix"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper","Slice zucchini into 1/4 inch thick rounds","In a bowl, mix Parmesan, breadcrumbs, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper","Brush zucchini slices with olive oil and dredge in the Parmesan mixture","Arrange on baking sheet in a single layer","Bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy","Mix Greek yogurt with ranch seasoning for the dip","Serve zucchini chips warm with the ranch dip"]}
{"indexTitle":"Zucchini Chips","aliases":["Crispy Baked Zucchini Chips with Ranch Dip","Zucchini Chips","Baked Veggie Chips","Parmesan Zucchini Crisps","Healthy Snack Chips"]}

{"Title":"Spicy Tuna Tartare on Cucumber Rounds","Description":"An elegant and refreshing appetizer","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"20 minutes","Notes":"Use sushi-grade tuna for best results and food safety","Ingredients":["1 lb sushi-grade tuna, diced","2 tbsp soy sauce","1 tbsp sesame oil","1 tsp sriracha sauce","1 tsp rice vinegar","2 green onions, finely chopped","1 tbsp sesame seeds","1 large cucumber","1 avocado, diced","Micro greens for garnish"],"Directions":["In a bowl, mix tuna, soy sauce, sesame oil, sriracha, and rice vinegar","Fold in green onions and sesame seeds","Slice cucumber into 1/4 inch thick rounds","Top each cucumber round with a spoonful of tuna mixture","Garnish with diced avocado and micro greens","Arrange on a serving platter and chill until ready to serve"]}
{"indexTitle":"Tuna Tartare","aliases":["Spicy Tuna Tartare on Cucumber Rounds","Tuna Tartare","Cucumber Tuna Bites","Raw Tuna Appetizer","Asian-Inspired Tuna Starter"]}

{"Title":"Hearty Vegetarian Lentil and Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Description":"A comforting plant-based version of the classic British dish","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 15 minutes","Notes":"Can be made vegan by using plant-based milk and butter in the mashed potatoes","Ingredients":["1 cup dry green lentils","2 cups vegetable broth","1 lb mushrooms, chopped","1 onion, diced","2 carrots, diced","2 celery stalks, diced","3 cloves garlic, minced","1 cup frozen peas","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 tsp dried thyme","1 tsp dried rosemary","Salt and pepper to taste","4 large potatoes, peeled and quartered","1/4 cup milk","2 tbsp butter","1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (optional)"],"Directions":["Cook lentils in vegetable broth until tender, about 20 minutes","Sauté mushrooms, onion, carrots, celery, and garlic until softened","Add cooked lentils, peas, tomato paste, thyme, and rosemary to the vegetables","Season with salt and pepper and transfer to a baking dish","Boil potatoes until soft, then mash with milk and butter","Spread mashed potatoes over the lentil mixture","Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese if using","Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 25-30 minutes until golden"]}

{"indexTitle":"Lentil Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","aliases":["Hearty Vegetarian Lentil and Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Lentil Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie","Meatless Shepherd's Pie","Plant-Based Casserole"]}

{"Title":"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Banana Bread","Description":"A moist and flavorful gluten-free twist on classic banana bread","Servings":"12 slices","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"50 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 5 minutes","Notes":"Add chocolate chips or chopped nuts for extra texture and flavor","Ingredients":["3 ripe bananas, mashed","3 eggs","1/4 cup honey","1/4 cup coconut oil, melted","1 tsp vanilla extract","2 1/4 cups almond flour","1 tsp baking soda","1/2 tsp cinnamon","1/4 tsp salt"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a 9x5 inch loaf pan with parchment paper","In a large bowl, mix mashed bananas, eggs, honey, coconut oil, and vanilla","In another bowl, combine almond flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt","Fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients until just combined","Pour batter into prepared loaf pan","Bake for 50-55 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean","Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack","Slice and serve once completely cooled"]}
{"indexTitle":"Almond Flour Banana Bread","aliases":["Gluten-Free Almond Flour Banana Bread","Almond Flour Banana Bread","Gluten-Free Banana Bread","Almond Banana Loaf","Wheat-Free Banana Bread"]}

{"Title":"Keto-Friendly Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry with Shrimp","Description":"A low-carb, high-flavor meal perfect for keto dieters","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"35 minutes","Notes":"For a vegetarian version, substitute shrimp with tofu or eggs","Ingredients":["1 large head cauliflower","1 lb medium shrimp, peeled and deveined","2 tbsp coconut oil","2 eggs, beaten","1/2 cup diced onion","2 cloves garlic, minced","1/2 cup diced bell pepper","1/4 cup coconut aminos or tamari sauce","1 tbsp sesame oil","2 green onions, sliced","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["Pulse cauliflower in a food processor until it resembles rice","Heat 1 tbsp coconut oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat","Cook shrimp until pink, remove from skillet","In the same skillet, scramble eggs and set aside","Heat remaining oil and sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper","Add cauliflower rice and cook for 5-7 minutes","Stir in coconut aminos, sesame oil, shrimp, and eggs","Season with salt and pepper","Garnish with green onions before serving"]}

{"indexTitle":"Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry","aliases":["Keto-Friendly Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry with Shrimp","Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry","Keto Shrimp Stir-Fry","Low-Carb Cauliflower Dish","Shrimp and Cauliflower Rice"]}

{"Title":"Hearty Vegetarian Lentil and Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Description":"A comforting vegetarian twist on the classic shepherd's pie","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 15 minutes","Notes":"Can be frozen for up to 3 months","Ingredients":["1 cup dried green lentils","2 cups vegetable broth","1 bay leaf","2 tbsp olive oil","1 onion, diced","2 carrots, diced","2 celery stalks, diced","8 oz mushrooms, sliced","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp dried thyme","1 tsp dried rosemary","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 cup frozen peas","Salt and pepper to taste","4 large potatoes, peeled and quartered","1/4 cup butter","1/4 cup milk","1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese"],"Directions":["Cook lentils in vegetable broth with bay leaf until tender, about 20 minutes","Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)","Sauté onion, carrots, celery, and mushrooms in olive oil until softened","Add garlic, thyme, and rosemary, cook for 1 minute","Stir in cooked lentils, tomato paste, and peas","Season with salt and pepper","Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with butter, milk, and Parmesan","Spread lentil mixture in a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes","Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden"]}

{"indexTitle":"Lentil Shepherd's Pie","aliases":["Hearty Vegetarian Lentil and Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Lentil Shepherd's Pie","Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie","Mushroom Shepherd's Pie","Meatless Shepherd's Pie"]}

{"Title":"Creamy Vegan Cashew Alfredo Pasta with Roasted Vegetables","Description":"A dairy-free twist on the classic Alfredo pasta","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"30 minutes","TotalTime":"50 minutes","Notes":"Soak cashews overnight for a creamier sauce","Ingredients":["12 oz fettuccine pasta","1 cup raw cashews, soaked overnight","1 cup water","3 cloves garlic","2 tbsp nutritional yeast","1 tbsp lemon juice","1 tsp salt","1/4 tsp black pepper","1 red bell pepper, sliced","1 zucchini, sliced","1 yellow squash, sliced","1 red onion, sliced","2 tbsp olive oil","1 tsp dried Italian herbs"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)","Toss vegetables with olive oil and herbs, roast for 20-25 minutes","Cook pasta according to package instructions","Blend soaked cashews, water, garlic, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth","Heat cashew sauce in a pan until warm","Toss cooked pasta with cashew sauce","Top with roasted vegetables and serve"]}
{"indexTitle":"Cashew Alfredo Pasta","aliases":["Creamy Vegan Cashew Alfredo Pasta with Roasted Vegetables","Cashew Alfredo Pasta","Vegan Alfredo Pasta","Dairy-Free Alfredo","Cashew Pasta Sauce"]}

{"Title":"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Banana Bread with Chocolate Chips","Description":"A moist and delicious gluten-free twist on classic banana bread","Servings":"12 slices","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"50 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 5 minutes","Notes":"Ensure all ingredients are certified gluten-free if severe gluten allergy is a concern","Ingredients":["3 ripe bananas, mashed","3 eggs","1/4 cup honey","1/4 cup coconut oil, melted","2 tsp vanilla extract","2 1/4 cups almond flour","1/2 tsp baking soda","1/4 tsp salt","1 tsp cinnamon","1/2 cup chocolate chips","1/2 cup chopped walnuts (optional)"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a 9x5 inch loaf pan with parchment paper","In a large bowl, mix mashed bananas, eggs, honey, melted coconut oil, and vanilla","In another bowl, combine almond flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon","Add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and mix until combined","Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts if using","Pour batter into prepared loaf pan","Bake for 50-55 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean","Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing"]}

{"indexTitle":"Almond Flour Banana Bread","aliases":["Gluten-Free Almond Flour Banana Bread with Chocolate Chips","Almond Flour Banana Bread","Gluten-Free Banana Bread","Chocolate Chip Banana Bread","Almond Banana Loaf"]}

{"Title":"Dairy-Free Coconut Curry Chicken with Vegetables","Description":"A creamy and flavorful dairy-free curry perfect for weeknight dinners","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"30 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"Serve with rice or cauliflower rice for a low-carb option","Ingredients":["1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes","1 can (14 oz) coconut milk","2 tbsp coconut oil","1 onion, diced","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp grated fresh ginger","2 tbsp curry powder","1 tsp turmeric","1 red bell pepper, sliced","1 zucchini, sliced","1 cup cherry tomatoes","1 cup spinach","Salt and pepper to taste","Fresh cilantro for garnish","Lime wedges for serving"],"Directions":["Heat coconut oil in a large skillet over medium heat","Add onion, garlic, and ginger, cook until softened","Add curry powder and turmeric, cook for 1 minute","Add chicken and cook until browned","Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer","Add bell pepper, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes","Simmer for 15-20 minutes until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender","Stir in spinach until wilted","Season with salt and pepper","Garnish with cilantro and serve with lime wedges"]}

{"indexTitle":"Coconut Curry Chicken","aliases":["Dairy-Free Coconut Curry Chicken with Vegetables","Coconut Curry Chicken","Dairy-Free Chicken Curry","Coconut Milk Curry","Thai-Inspired Chicken Curry"]}

{"Title":"Keto-Friendly Bacon-Wrapped Stuffed Chicken Breast","Description":"A low-carb, high-fat main dish perfect for keto dieters","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"Serve with a side of roasted low-carb vegetables","Ingredients":["4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts","8 slices bacon","4 oz cream cheese, softened","1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese","2 oz fresh spinach, chopped","2 cloves garlic, minced","1/4 tsp onion powder","Salt and pepper to taste","1 tbsp olive oil"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)","In a bowl, mix cream cheese, cheddar, spinach, garlic, and onion powder","Cut a pocket into each chicken breast","Stuff each chicken breast with the cheese mixture","Wrap each stuffed chicken breast with 2 slices of bacon","Season with salt and pepper","Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat","Sear chicken for 2-3 minutes per side","Transfer skillet to the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, until chicken is cooked through","Let rest for 5 minutes before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Stuffed Chicken Breast","aliases":["Keto-Friendly Bacon-Wrapped Stuffed Chicken Breast","Stuffed Chicken Breast","Bacon-Wrapped Chicken","Keto Chicken Dish","Cheese-Stuffed Chicken"]}

{"Title":"Creamy Vegan Cashew Alfredo Pasta","Description":"A rich and dairy-free twist on the classic Italian sauce","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"30 minutes","Notes":"Soak cashews overnight or in hot water for 1 hour before blending for best results","Ingredients":["1 cup raw cashews, soaked and drained","3/4 cup water","2 tbsp nutritional yeast","2 cloves garlic","2 tbsp lemon juice","1 tsp salt","1/4 tsp black pepper","12 oz fettuccine pasta (or gluten-free pasta)","1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley"],"Directions":["Blend cashews, water, nutritional yeast, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth","Cook pasta according to package instructions","Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water","In a large pan, heat the cashew sauce over medium heat","Add cooked pasta and toss to coat, adding pasta water if needed to thin the sauce","Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately"]}
{"indexTitle":"Cashew Alfredo Pasta","aliases":["Creamy Vegan Cashew Alfredo Pasta","Cashew Alfredo Pasta","Vegan Alfredo","Dairy-Free Pasta Sauce","Plant-Based Pasta Dish"]}

{"Title":"Dairy-Free Coconut Mango Chia Pudding","Description":"A tropical and creamy breakfast or dessert without any dairy","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"4 hours 10 minutes (including chilling)","Notes":"Can be prepared the night before for an easy breakfast","Ingredients":["1 can (13.5 oz) full-fat coconut milk","1/4 cup chia seeds","2 tbsp maple syrup","1 tsp vanilla extract","2 ripe mangoes, diced","1/4 cup toasted coconut flakes","Fresh mint leaves for garnish"],"Directions":["In a bowl, whisk together coconut milk, chia seeds, maple syrup, and vanilla","Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight","Stir the pudding and divide into 4 serving glasses","Top with diced mango and toasted coconut flakes","Garnish with fresh mint leaves before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Coconut Chia Pudding","aliases":["Dairy-Free Coconut Mango Chia Pudding","Coconut Chia Pudding","Mango Chia Pudding","Tropical Chia Breakfast","Vegan Chia Dessert"]}

{"Title":"Classic Margherita Pizza with Homemade Thin Crust","Description":"A simple yet delicious Italian pizza with fresh ingredients","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"2 hours (including dough rising)","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"2 hours 15 minutes","Notes":"For best results, use a pizza stone and preheat it in the oven","Ingredients":["For the dough: 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tsp instant yeast, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 cup warm water","For the topping: 1 cup San Marzano tomato sauce, 8 oz fresh mozzarella, sliced","10 fresh basil leaves","2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil","Salt to taste"],"Directions":["Mix flour, yeast, and salt in a bowl","Add olive oil and water, knead until smooth","Let dough rise in a covered bowl for 1-2 hours","Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C) with pizza stone inside","Roll out dough thinly and transfer to a pizza peel","Spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella slices","Slide pizza onto the hot stone and bake for 12-15 minutes","Remove from oven, add fresh basil leaves","Drizzle with olive oil, slice, and serve"]}
{"indexTitle":"Margherita Pizza","aliases":["Classic Margherita Pizza with Homemade Thin Crust","Margherita Pizza","Homemade Italian Pizza","Thin Crust Pizza","Traditional Pizza Margherita"]}

{"Title":"Authentic French Coq au Vin","Description":"A rich and flavorful chicken stew braised in red wine","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"2 hours","TotalTime":"2 hours 30 minutes","Notes":"Traditionally served with crusty bread or over mashed potatoes","Ingredients":["1 whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces","8 oz bacon, diced","1 onion, chopped","2 carrots, sliced","8 oz mushrooms, quartered","3 cloves garlic, minced","2 cups red wine (preferably Burgundy)","1 cup chicken stock","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 bouquet garni (thyme, parsley, bay leaf)","1/4 cup brandy","3 tbsp flour","3 tbsp butter","Salt and pepper to taste","Chopped fresh parsley for garnish"],"Directions":["In a large Dutch oven, cook bacon until crispy, then set aside","Brown chicken pieces in the bacon fat, then set aside","Sauté onions, carrots, and mushrooms in the same pot","Add garlic, cook for 1 minute","Deglaze with brandy, then add wine, stock, tomato paste, and bouquet garni","Return chicken and bacon to the pot, bring to a simmer","Cover and cook on low heat for 1.5 hours","In a small bowl, mash butter and flour to create a beurre manié","Stir beurre manié into the stew to thicken","Simmer for 10 more minutes, season with salt and pepper","Garnish with parsley before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Coq au Vin","aliases":["Authentic French Coq au Vin","Coq au Vin","French Chicken Stew","Red Wine Braised Chicken","Classic French Dish"]}

{"Title":"Spicy Sichuan Mapo Tofu","Description":"A fiery and numbing Chinese dish featuring soft tofu in a flavorful sauce","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"20 minutes","TotalTime":"35 minutes","Notes":"Adjust the amount of chili oil and Sichuan peppercorns to your heat preference","Ingredients":["1 block (14 oz) soft tofu, cubed","1/2 lb ground pork","2 tbsp Sichuan chili bean paste (doubanjiang)","2 tbsp chili oil","1 tbsp fermented black beans, rinsed and chopped","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp ginger, minced","2 green onions, chopped","1 cup chicken stock","1 tsp Sichuan peppercorns, ground","1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water","1 tsp sesame oil","Steamed rice for serving"],"Directions":["Heat chili oil in a wok over medium-high heat","Add ground pork and cook until browned","Stir in chili bean paste, fermented black beans, garlic, and ginger","Pour in chicken stock and bring to a simmer","Gently add tofu cubes and simmer for 5 minutes","Stir in cornstarch slurry to thicken the sauce","Add ground Sichuan peppercorns and sesame oil","Garnish with green onions and serve over steamed rice"]}
{"indexTitle":"Mapo Tofu","aliases":["Spicy Sichuan Mapo Tofu","Mapo Tofu","Sichuan Tofu Dish","Spicy Chinese Tofu","Pork and Tofu Stir-Fry"]}

{"Title":"Classic Italian Margherita Pizza with Homemade Dough","Description":"A simple yet delicious traditional Neapolitan pizza","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"2 hours","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"2 hours 10 minutes","Notes":"For best results, use a pizza stone and preheat your oven to its highest setting","Ingredients":["For the dough: 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tsp instant yeast, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup warm water, 1 tbsp olive oil","For the topping: 1 can (14 oz) San Marzano tomatoes, 8 oz fresh mozzarella, Fresh basil leaves, Extra virgin olive oil, Salt to taste"],"Directions":["Mix flour, yeast, and salt in a bowl","Add water and olive oil, knead until smooth","Let dough rise for 1-2 hours","Crush tomatoes and season with salt","Divide dough into 4 balls, stretch each into a circle","Top with tomatoes, torn mozzarella, and basil","Drizzle with olive oil","Bake on a preheated pizza stone at highest oven setting for 8-10 minutes","Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Margherita Pizza","aliases":["Classic Italian Margherita Pizza with Homemade Dough","Margherita Pizza","Neapolitan Pizza","Homemade Pizza","Traditional Italian Pizza"]}

{"Title":"Authentic French Coq au Vin with Red Wine Sauce","Description":"A hearty French chicken stew braised in red wine","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"1 hour 30 minutes","TotalTime":"2 hours","Notes":"Best served with crusty bread to soak up the sauce","Ingredients":["1 whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces","8 oz bacon, diced","1 onion, chopped","2 carrots, sliced","8 oz mushrooms, quartered","3 cloves garlic, minced","2 cups red wine (preferably Burgundy)","1 cup chicken broth","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 bouquet garni (thyme, parsley, bay leaf)","3 tbsp butter","3 tbsp flour","Salt and pepper to taste","Fresh parsley for garnish"],"Directions":["Brown bacon in a large Dutch oven, remove and set aside","Season chicken with salt and pepper, brown in bacon fat, then remove","Sauté onions, carrots, and mushrooms until softened","Add garlic, cook for 1 minute","Return chicken and bacon to the pot","Add wine, broth, tomato paste, and bouquet garni","Simmer covered for 1 hour or until chicken is tender","In a small bowl, mash butter and flour to make a beurre manié","Stir beurre manié into the sauce to thicken","Simmer for 5 more minutes","Garnish with parsley before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Coq au Vin","aliases":["Authentic French Coq au Vin with Red Wine Sauce","Coq au Vin","French Chicken Stew","Red Wine Braised Chicken","Classic French Dish"]}

{"Title":"Traditional Chinese Mapo Tofu with Ground Pork","Description":"A spicy and flavorful Sichuan dish featuring soft tofu and ground pork","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"20 minutes","TotalTime":"35 minutes","Notes":"Adjust the amount of chili oil to control the spice level","Ingredients":["1 block (14 oz) soft tofu, cubed","1/2 lb ground pork","2 tbsp Sichuan peppercorns","3 tbsp chili oil","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp ginger, minced","2 green onions, chopped","2 tbsp doubanjiang (spicy bean paste)","1 tbsp soy sauce","1 tsp sugar","1 cup chicken broth","2 tsp cornstarch mixed with 1 tbsp water"],"Directions":["Toast Sichuan peppercorns in a dry wok, then grind","Heat chili oil in the wok over medium-high heat","Add garlic, ginger, and white parts of green onions, stir-fry until fragrant","Add ground pork and cook until browned","Stir in doubanjiang, soy sauce, and sugar","Pour in chicken broth and bring to a simmer","Gently add tofu cubes and simmer for 5 minutes","Stir in cornstarch slurry to thicken the sauce","Sprinkle with ground Sichuan peppercorns and green onion tops","Serve hot with steamed rice"]}

{"Title":"Spicy Thai Green Curry with Chicken and Vegetables","Description":"A fragrant and fiery Thai curry with tender chicken and crisp vegetables","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"Adjust the amount of curry paste to control the spice level","Ingredients":["1 lb boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces","1 can (14 oz) coconut milk","2-3 tbsp Thai green curry paste","2 tbsp fish sauce","1 tbsp palm sugar or brown sugar","1 red bell pepper, sliced","1 zucchini, sliced","1 cup Thai eggplant, quartered","1 cup bamboo shoots","2 kaffir lime leaves","1 cup Thai basil leaves","2 tbsp vegetable oil","Jasmine rice for serving"],"Directions":["Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat","Add curry paste and fry until fragrant","Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer","Add chicken and kaffir lime leaves, simmer for 10 minutes","Add bell pepper, zucchini, eggplant, and bamboo shoots","Cook for another 5-7 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp","Stir in fish sauce and palm sugar","Remove from heat and stir in Thai basil leaves","Serve hot with jasmine rice"]}

{"Title":"Authentic Mexican Chicken Mole Poblano","Description":"A rich and complex Mexican dish featuring chicken in a deep, chocolatey sauce","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"45 minutes","CookTime":"2 hours","TotalTime":"2 hours 45 minutes","Notes":"Mole sauce can be made ahead and frozen for future use","Ingredients":["6 chicken thighs","4 dried ancho chiles","2 dried guajillo chiles","1 onion, chopped","3 cloves garlic, minced","1/4 cup sesame seeds","1/4 cup pumpkin seeds","1/4 cup almonds","2 corn tortillas, torn into pieces","2 tomatoes, chopped","1 plantain, sliced","2 oz dark chocolate","1 cinnamon stick","1 tsp dried oregano","1/2 tsp ground cumin","4 cups chicken broth","2 tbsp vegetable oil","Salt to taste"],"Directions":["Toast chiles, seeds, and nuts in a dry skillet","Soak toasted chiles in hot water for 30 minutes, then blend into a paste","Fry onion and garlic in oil until softened","Add chile paste, tomatoes, plantain, spices, and tortillas, cook for 5 minutes","Pour in broth and simmer for 45 minutes","Blend sauce until smooth, then strain","Brown chicken thighs in a large pot","Pour mole sauce over chicken and simmer for 1 hour","Stir in chocolate until melted","Serve chicken topped with mole sauce"]}

{"Title":"Classic Greek Moussaka with Eggplant and Ground Lamb","Description":"A hearty Greek casserole layered with eggplant, spiced ground lamb, and creamy béchamel","Servings":"8","PrepTime":"45 minutes","CookTime":"1 hour","TotalTime":"1 hour 45 minutes","Notes":"Can be assembled ahead and baked just before serving","Ingredients":["3 large eggplants, sliced","1 lb ground lamb","1 onion, finely chopped","3 cloves garlic, minced","1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 tsp ground cinnamon","1/4 tsp ground allspice","1/2 cup red wine","Salt and pepper to taste","For the béchamel: 4 tbsp butter, 1/4 cup flour, 3 cups milk, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 egg yolks, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan"],"Directions":["Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and bake at 400°F for 20 minutes","Brown lamb in a skillet, add onion and garlic","Stir in tomatoes, paste, spices, and wine; simmer for 20 minutes","Make béchamel: Melt butter, whisk in flour, gradually add milk, cook until thickened","Remove from heat, stir in nutmeg, egg yolks, and Parmesan","Layer eggplant and meat sauce in a baking dish","Top with béchamel sauce","Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden brown","Let cool for 15 minutes before serving"]}

{"Title":"Authentic Indian Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)","Description":"A rich and creamy North Indian curry with tender chicken in a tomato-based sauce","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"40 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 10 minutes","Notes":"Marinate the chicken overnight for best flavor","Ingredients":["2 lbs boneless chicken thighs, cut into pieces","1 cup plain yogurt","2 tbsp lemon juice","2 tsp turmeric powder","2 tsp garam masala","2 tsp ground cumin","2 tbsp vegetable oil","1 large onion, finely chopped","3 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp ginger, grated","1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes","1 cup heavy cream","1/4 cup butter","1 tbsp kasoori methi (dried fenugreek leaves)","Salt to taste","Fresh cilantro for garnish"],"Directions":["Mix yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for marinade","Marinate chicken for at least 2 hours or overnight","Heat oil in a large pot, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger","Add marinated chicken and cook until browned","Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes","Add cream, butter, and kasoori methi","Simmer for 15 more minutes until chicken is cooked through","Adjust salt to taste","Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan bread"]}

{"Title":"Traditional Spanish Paella Valenciana","Description":"A classic Spanish rice dish with chicken, rabbit, and vegetables","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 15 minutes","Notes":"Use a wide, shallow paella pan for the best results","Ingredients":["2 cups Bomba or Calasparra rice","4 cups chicken broth","1/2 lb chicken thighs, cut into pieces","1/2 lb rabbit, cut into pieces","1 cup green beans, trimmed","1 cup artichoke hearts, quartered","1 tomato, grated","1 onion, finely chopped","4 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp smoked paprika","1/4 tsp saffron threads","1/4 cup olive oil","1 lemon, cut into wedges","Salt to taste"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a paella pan over medium heat","Brown chicken and rabbit pieces","Add onion and garlic, sauté until softened","Stir in grated tomato, green beans, and artichokes","Add rice, paprika, and saffron, stirring to coat","Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil","Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes without stirring","Increase heat for the last 5 minutes to create a crispy bottom (socarrat)","Remove from heat and let rest for 5 minutes","Serve with lemon wedges"]}

{"Title":"Sous Vide Herb-Butter Salmon with Lemon and Dill","Description":"Perfectly cooked, moist salmon using the sous vide method","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"55 minutes","Notes":"Ensure salmon fillets are of even thickness for consistent cooking","Ingredients":["4 salmon fillets (6 oz each)","4 tbsp unsalted butter, softened","2 tbsp fresh dill, chopped","1 lemon, zested and juiced","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp salt","1/4 tsp black pepper","Extra virgin olive oil for searing","Lemon wedges for serving"],"Directions":["Set sous vide circulator to 125°F (52°C) for medium-rare salmon","Mix softened butter with dill, lemon zest, garlic, salt, and pepper","Place each salmon fillet in a separate sous vide bag","Divide herb butter among the fillets","Seal bags using water displacement method","Cook in the water bath for 45 minutes","Remove salmon from bags and pat dry","Heat a skillet over high heat with a little olive oil","Sear salmon skin-side down for 30 seconds for crispy skin","Serve with lemon wedges and any remaining herb butter from the bags"]}

{"Title":"Classic French Coq au Vin with Red Wine Braised Chicken","Description":"A traditional French dish of chicken braised in red wine, bacon, and mushrooms","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"1 hour 30 minutes","TotalTime":"2 hours","Notes":"Tastes even better the next day","Ingredients":["1 whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces","8 oz bacon, diced","1 large onion, chopped","2 carrots, sliced","8 oz mushrooms, quartered","3 cloves garlic, minced","2 cups red wine (preferably Burgundy)","2 cups chicken stock","2 tbsp tomato paste","1 bouquet garni (thyme, parsley, bay leaf)","3 tbsp butter","3 tbsp all-purpose flour","1/4 cup brandy","Salt and pepper to taste","Chopped fresh parsley for garnish"],"Directions":["In a large Dutch oven, cook bacon until crispy, remove and set aside","Brown chicken pieces in bacon fat, remove and set aside","Sauté onions, carrots, and mushrooms in the same pot","Add garlic, cook for 1 minute","Deglaze with brandy, then add wine, stock, tomato paste, and bouquet garni","Return chicken and bacon to the pot, bring to a simmer","Cover and cook on low heat for 1 hour","Remove chicken and vegetables, strain the sauce","In a separate pan, make a roux with butter and flour","Whisk roux into the strained sauce to thicken","Return chicken and vegetables to the sauce, simmer for 15 minutes","Garnish with parsley before serving"]}

{"Title":"Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken with Herb Butter","Description":"A flavorful and juicy whole roasted chicken infused with lemon, garlic, and herbs","Servings":"4-6","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"1 hour 30 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 50 minutes","Notes":"Let the chicken rest for 10-15 minutes before carving for juicier meat","Ingredients":["1 whole chicken (4-5 lbs)","1 lemon, quartered","1 head of garlic, halved crosswise","4 sprigs fresh thyme","4 sprigs fresh rosemary","1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened","2 tbsp olive oil","1 tbsp lemon zest","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp salt","1/2 tsp black pepper"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)","Mix softened butter with lemon zest, minced garlic, salt, and pepper","Gently loosen chicken skin and spread herb butter underneath","Stuff chicken cavity with lemon quarters, garlic halves, and herb sprigs","Tie legs together with kitchen twine and tuck wing tips","Brush chicken with olive oil and season the outside with salt and pepper","Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes to 1 hour 30 minutes, until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C)","Let rest before carving and serving"]}

{"Title":"Grilled Ribeye Steak with Rosemary Compound Butter","Description":"A perfectly grilled, juicy ribeye steak topped with a flavorful herb butter","Servings":"2","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"25 minutes","Notes":"Let steaks come to room temperature before grilling for even cooking","Ingredients":["2 ribeye steaks (1-inch thick, about 12 oz each)","2 tbsp olive oil","2 tsp kosher salt","1 tsp freshly ground black pepper","For the compound butter: 4 tbsp unsalted butter (softened), 1 tbsp fresh rosemary (finely chopped), 1 clove garlic (minced), 1/4 tsp salt"],"Directions":["Mix softened butter with rosemary, garlic, and salt; roll into a log and chill","Preheat grill to high heat (450-500°F)","Brush steaks with olive oil and season with salt and pepper","Grill steaks for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare","Let steaks rest for 5 minutes","Top each steak with a slice of the rosemary compound butter","Serve immediately"]}

{"Title":"Creamy Mushroom Risotto with Parmesan and Truffle Oil","Description":"A luxurious and comforting Italian rice dish featuring earthy mushrooms and rich flavors","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"30 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"Stir constantly for the creamiest texture","Ingredients":["1 1/2 cups Arborio rice","6 cups vegetable or chicken broth, heated","1 lb mixed mushrooms (cremini, shiitake, oyster), sliced","1 onion, finely chopped","3 cloves garlic, minced","1/2 cup dry white wine","4 tbsp butter","2 tbsp olive oil","1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese","2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped","1 tbsp truffle oil (optional)","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["In a large pan, sauté mushrooms in 1 tbsp butter and 1 tbsp oil until golden; set aside","In the same pan, sauté onion and garlic in remaining oil until softened","Add rice and stir to coat with oil","Pour in wine and simmer until absorbed","Add broth one ladleful at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed before adding more","Continue until rice is creamy and al dente (about 20-25 minutes)","Stir in mushrooms, remaining butter, and Parmesan","Season with salt and pepper","Garnish with parsley and a drizzle of truffle oil if using","Serve immediately"]}

{"Title":"Honey Garlic Glazed Salmon with Roasted Vegetables","Description":"Flaky salmon fillets glazed with a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"20 minutes","TotalTime":"35 minutes","Notes":"Use skin-on salmon fillets for best results","Ingredients":["4 salmon fillets (6 oz each)","1/4 cup honey","3 tbsp soy sauce","3 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp grated fresh ginger","1 tbsp olive oil","Salt and pepper to taste","2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini), chopped","Lemon wedges for serving","Chopped green onions for garnish"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)","In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger","Place salmon fillets on a lined baking sheet","Brush half of the honey garlic mixture over the salmon","Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper","Arrange vegetables around the salmon on the baking sheet","Bake for 15-20 minutes, brushing salmon with remaining glaze halfway through","Broil for 2-3 minutes at the end for a caramelized finish","Garnish with green onions and serve with lemon wedges"]}

{"Title":"Classic Roast Turkey with Herb Stuffing and Gravy","Description":"A traditional Thanksgiving centerpiece with all the trimmings","Servings":"10-12","PrepTime":"45 minutes","CookTime":"3 hours 30 minutes","TotalTime":"4 hours 15 minutes","Notes":"Start thawing a frozen turkey in the refrigerator 1 day for every 4 pounds","Ingredients":["1 whole turkey (12-14 lbs), thawed","1 cup unsalted butter, softened","2 tbsp fresh sage, chopped","2 tbsp fresh thyme leaves","2 tbsp fresh rosemary, chopped","Salt and pepper to taste","2 onions, quartered","2 carrots, chopped","2 celery stalks, chopped","For the stuffing: 12 cups bread cubes, 1 cup butter, 2 onions (diced), 4 celery stalks (diced), 2 eggs (beaten), 1 cup chicken broth, 1 tbsp each sage, thyme, and rosemary","For the gravy: 4 cups turkey drippings/stock, 1/4 cup flour"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C)","Mix softened butter with sage, thyme, and rosemary","Carefully loosen turkey skin and spread herb butter underneath","Season turkey cavity with salt and pepper","Stuff turkey with onions, carrots, and celery","Tie legs together and tuck wing tips","Roast turkey for about 15 minutes per pound, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C)","For stuffing, sauté onions and celery in butter, mix with bread cubes, eggs, broth, and herbs","Bake stuffing separately for the last hour of turkey roasting","For gravy, whisk flour into turkey drippings, gradually add stock, and simmer until thickened","Let turkey rest for 20 minutes before carving","Serve with stuffing and gravy"]}

{"Title":"Festive Christmas Yule Log Cake (Bûche de Noël)","Description":"A traditional French Christmas dessert resembling a festive log","Servings":"10-12","PrepTime":"1 hour","CookTime":"12 minutes","TotalTime":"3 hours (including cooling and decorating)","Notes":"Can be made a day ahead and refrigerated","Ingredients":["For the cake: 4 eggs, 2/3 cup sugar, 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 tsp vanilla extract","For the filling: 1 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup powdered sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract","For the frosting: 12 oz semisweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup corn syrup","For decoration: Powdered sugar, Sugared cranberries, Rosemary sprigs"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a jelly roll pan with parchment","Beat eggs and sugar until light and fluffy","Fold in flour, cocoa powder, and vanilla","Spread batter evenly in the pan and bake for 12 minutes","Immediately turn cake onto a towel dusted with cocoa powder and roll up","Let cool completely","Whip cream with sugar and vanilla for filling","Unroll cake, spread with filling, and re-roll","For frosting, heat cream and corn syrup, pour over chocolate chips, and stir until smooth","Cover cake with frosting, creating a bark-like texture","Decorate with powdered sugar 'snow', sugared cranberries, and rosemary 'pine needles'","Refrigerate until serving"]}

{"Title":"Festive New Year's Eve Champagne Punch","Description":"A bubbly and fruity punch perfect for ringing in the New Year","Servings":"12","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"15 minutes","Notes":"Add champagne just before serving to maintain bubbles","Ingredients":["2 bottles (750 ml each) chilled champagne or prosecco","2 cups vodka","2 cups white cranberry juice","1 cup triple sec","1/2 cup fresh lemon juice","1/4 cup simple syrup","2 cups fresh strawberries, sliced","1 orange, thinly sliced","1 lemon, thinly sliced","Fresh mint sprigs for garnish","Ice for serving"],"Directions":["In a large punch bowl, combine vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup","Add sliced strawberries, orange, and lemon","Refrigerate mixture for at least 1 hour to chill and let flavors meld","Just before serving, add champagne and stir gently","Fill glasses with ice and ladle in punch","Garnish each glass with a mint sprig","Serve immediately and enjoy responsibly"]}

{"Title":"Classic Roast Turkey with Herb Butter and Gravy","Description":"A traditional Thanksgiving turkey with crispy skin and juicy meat, perfect for holiday gatherings","Servings":"12","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"3 hours 30 minutes","TotalTime":"4 hours","Notes":"Allow the turkey to come to room temperature before roasting for even cooking","Ingredients":["1 whole turkey (12-14 lbs), giblets removed","1 cup unsalted butter, softened","2 tbsp fresh sage, chopped","2 tbsp fresh thyme leaves","2 tbsp fresh rosemary, chopped","4 cloves garlic, minced","Zest of 1 lemon","Salt and black pepper to taste","1 onion, quartered","1 lemon, quartered","4 cups chicken broth","1/4 cup all-purpose flour"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)","Mix softened butter with herbs, garlic, lemon zest, salt, and pepper","Carefully loosen turkey skin and spread herb butter underneath","Stuff cavity with onion and lemon quarters","Tie legs together and tuck wing tips","Place turkey in a roasting pan and brush with remaining herb butter","Roast for 30 minutes, then reduce heat to 350°F (175°C)","Continue roasting, basting occasionally, until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C)","Let turkey rest for 20 minutes before carving","For gravy, strain pan drippings and skim off fat","Whisk flour into 1/4 cup of fat, then add to pan juices with broth","Simmer gravy until thickened, season to taste"]}

{"Title":"Decadent Chocolate Lava Cakes for Two","Description":"Rich, individual chocolate cakes with a gooey molten center, perfect for a romantic dessert","Servings":"2","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"12 minutes","TotalTime":"27 minutes","Notes":"Serve immediately for the best molten center effect","Ingredients":["4 oz dark chocolate, chopped","1/4 cup unsalted butter","1 large egg","1 egg yolk","2 tbsp granulated sugar","1 tbsp all-purpose flour","1/8 tsp salt","1 tsp vanilla extract","Butter and cocoa powder for ramekins","Powdered sugar for dusting","Vanilla ice cream or whipped cream for serving (optional)"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)","Butter two 6-oz ramekins and dust with cocoa powder","Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler or microwave","In a separate bowl, whisk egg, egg yolk, and sugar until pale and thick","Fold melted chocolate mixture into egg mixture","Stir in flour, salt, and vanilla","Divide batter between prepared ramekins","Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are set but center is still soft","Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates","Dust with powdered sugar and serve with ice cream or whipped cream if desired"]}

{"Title":"Festive Christmas Cranberry and Pistachio Biscotti","Description":"Crunchy Italian cookies studded with dried cranberries and pistachios, perfect for holiday gifting","Servings":"24 biscotti","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"50 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour 10 minutes","Notes":"Store in an airtight container for up to two weeks","Ingredients":["2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour","1 tsp baking powder","1/2 tsp salt","1 cup granulated sugar","3 large eggs","2 tbsp orange zest","1 tsp vanilla extract","1/2 tsp almond extract","1 cup dried cranberries","1 cup shelled pistachios","1 egg white (for brushing)"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper","In a bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, and salt","In another bowl, beat sugar and eggs until pale, then mix in zest and extracts","Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients","Fold in cranberries and pistachios","Divide dough in half and shape into two 12-inch logs on the baking sheet","Brush logs with beaten egg white","Bake for 30 minutes, then let cool for 15 minutes","Reduce oven to 325°F (165°C)","Slice logs diagonally into 1/2-inch thick pieces","Arrange slices on baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes per side until crisp","Cool completely before storing or serving"]}

{"Title":"Colorful Fourth of July Berry Trifle","Description":"A patriotic layered dessert with fresh berries, cake, and cream, perfect for summer celebrations","Servings":"12","PrepTime":"30 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"30 minutes","Notes":"Can be made up to 24 hours in advance","Ingredients":["1 store-bought angel food cake, cut into 1-inch cubes","2 cups heavy cream","1/4 cup powdered sugar","1 tsp vanilla extract","16 oz cream cheese, softened","2 cups vanilla pudding","2 cups fresh strawberries, sliced","2 cups fresh blueberries","2 cups fresh raspberries","2 tbsp lemon juice"],"Directions":["In a large bowl, whip heavy cream with powdered sugar and vanilla until stiff peaks form","In another bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth, then fold in pudding","Gently fold half of the whipped cream into the cream cheese mixture","Toss berries with lemon juice","In a large trifle dish, layer 1/3 of the cake cubes","Top with 1/3 of the cream mixture and 1/3 of the berries","Repeat layers twice more, ending with berries","Dollop remaining whipped cream on top","Arrange extra berries in a flag pattern if desired","Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving"]}

{"Title":"Intermediate French Technique: Classic Cheese Soufflé","Description":"A light and airy cheese soufflé showcasing fundamental French cooking techniques","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"30 minutes","TotalTime":"50 minutes","Notes":"Serve immediately as soufflés deflate quickly","Ingredients":["3 tbsp unsalted butter","3 tbsp all-purpose flour","1 cup milk, heated","1/4 tsp nutmeg","1/2 tsp salt","1/4 tsp white pepper","4 large egg yolks","5 large egg whites","1 cup Gruyère cheese, grated","1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, grated","Butter and grated Parmesan for coating ramekins"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)","Butter four 1-cup ramekins and coat with grated Parmesan","Make a béchamel: Melt butter, whisk in flour, gradually add milk, cook until thickened","Add nutmeg, salt, and pepper to béchamel","Whisk egg yolks into the cooled béchamel","Stir in Gruyère and Parmesan cheeses","Beat egg whites to stiff peaks","Gently fold egg whites into cheese mixture","Pour into prepared ramekins","Bake for 25-30 minutes until puffed and golden","Serve immediately"]}

{"Title":"Intermediate Homemade Pasta with Classic Tomato Sauce","Description":"Learn to make fresh pasta from scratch paired with a simple yet delicious tomato sauce","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"45 minutes","CookTime":"15 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour","Notes":"Let the pasta dough rest for at least 30 minutes before rolling","Ingredients":["For the pasta: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3 large eggs, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp salt","For the sauce: 1 can (28 oz) whole peeled tomatoes, 3 cloves garlic (minced), 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup fresh basil (chopped), Salt and pepper to taste","Grated Parmesan cheese for serving"],"Directions":["For the pasta, mound flour on a clean surface and create a well in the center","Crack eggs into the well and add olive oil and salt","Gradually incorporate flour into eggs until a dough forms","Knead dough for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic","Wrap in plastic and let rest for 30 minutes","Roll out dough and cut into desired pasta shape","For the sauce, heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant","Add tomatoes, crushing them with your hands, and simmer for 20 minutes","Stir in chopped basil and season with salt and pepper","Cook fresh pasta in boiling salted water for 2-3 minutes until al dente","Toss cooked pasta with sauce and serve with grated Parmesan"]}

{"Title":"Meal Prep Chicken Burrito Bowls for the Week","Description":"A versatile and nutritious meal prep recipe to enjoy throughout the week","Servings":"5","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"45 minutes","Notes":"Store in airtight containers in the refrigerator for up to 5 days","Ingredients":["1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts","2 tbsp olive oil","2 tbsp taco seasoning","2.5 cups cooked brown rice","1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed","1 cup frozen corn, thawed","1 red bell pepper, sliced","1 cup salsa","5 cups chopped romaine lettuce","1 cup shredded cheddar cheese","Optional toppings: avocado, sour cream, cilantro"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)","Coat chicken with olive oil and taco seasoning","Bake chicken for 20-25 minutes until cooked through","Let chicken cool, then slice","Cook brown rice according to package instructions","Divide rice among 5 meal prep containers","Top rice with sliced chicken, black beans, corn, and bell pepper","Add salsa and cheese to each container","Store lettuce separately to keep it crisp","When ready to eat, heat the container (except lettuce) and add lettuce and optional toppings"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chicken Burrito Bowls","aliases":["Meal Prep Chicken Burrito Bowls for the Week","Chicken Burrito Bowls","Meal Prep Burrito Bowls","Weekly Lunch Prep","Make-Ahead Mexican Bowls"]}

{"Title":"15-Minute Spicy Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry","Description":"A quick and flavorful shrimp dish perfect for busy weeknights","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"5 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"15 minutes","Notes":"Serve over rice or with crusty bread to soak up the sauce","Ingredients":["1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined","4 cloves garlic, minced","1 tsp red pepper flakes","2 tbsp olive oil","2 tbsp butter","2 tbsp lemon juice","1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped","Salt and black pepper to taste"],"Directions":["In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat","Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper","Cook shrimp for 2-3 minutes until they start to turn pink","Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for another minute","Stir in butter and lemon juice, cook until shrimp are fully pink and cooked through","Remove from heat and sprinkle with fresh parsley","Serve immediately"]}
{"indexTitle":"Garlic Shrimp","aliases":["15-Minute Spicy Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry","Garlic Shrimp","Quick Shrimp Stir-Fry","Spicy Shrimp Dish","Fast Seafood Dinner"]}

{"Title":"30-Minute One-Pot Creamy Chicken Pasta","Description":"A comforting and easy pasta dish that comes together in just 30 minutes","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"20 minutes","TotalTime":"30 minutes","Notes":"Use rotisserie chicken to save even more time","Ingredients":["8 oz penne pasta","2 cups cooked chicken, diced","1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved","2 cups baby spinach","1 cup heavy cream","1/2 cup chicken broth","1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp olive oil","1 tsp dried Italian herbs","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat","Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant","Pour in chicken broth and heavy cream, bring to a simmer","Add pasta and Italian herbs, cook for 10-12 minutes until pasta is al dente","Stir in cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, and spinach","Cook for another 2-3 minutes until spinach wilts","Remove from heat and stir in Parmesan cheese","Season with salt and pepper to taste","Serve hot"]}
{"indexTitle":"Creamy Chicken Pasta","aliases":["30-Minute One-Pot Creamy Chicken Pasta","Creamy Chicken Pasta","Quick Pasta Dinner","One-Pot Chicken Pasta","Easy Weeknight Pasta"]}

{"Title":"5-Ingredient Slow Cooker Salsa Chicken","Description":"A simple and flavorful chicken dish that practically cooks itself","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"5 minutes","CookTime":"6 hours","TotalTime":"6 hours 5 minutes","Notes":"Great for tacos, burritos, or served over rice","Ingredients":["3 lbs boneless, skinless chicken breasts","16 oz jar salsa","1 packet taco seasoning","1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed","1 cup frozen corn kernels"],"Directions":["Place chicken breasts in the slow cooker","Sprinkle taco seasoning over the chicken","Pour salsa over the seasoned chicken","Cover and cook on low for 6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours","30 minutes before serving, shred the chicken with two forks","Add black beans and corn, stir to combine","Continue cooking for the remaining 30 minutes","Serve hot with your choice of toppings"]}

{"Title":"10-Minute Mediterranean Chickpea Salad","Description":"A quick and healthy salad perfect for lunch or as a side dish","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"10 minutes","Notes":"Can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 3 days","Ingredients":["2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas, drained and rinsed","1 cucumber, diced","1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved","1/4 red onion, finely chopped","1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese","1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped","3 tbsp olive oil","2 tbsp lemon juice","1 tsp dried oregano","Salt and pepper to taste"],"Directions":["In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and parsley","In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper","Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine","Taste and adjust seasoning if needed","Serve immediately or chill before serving"]}
{"indexTitle":"Chickpea Salad","aliases":["10-Minute Mediterranean Chickpea Salad","Chickpea Salad","Quick Mediterranean Salad","Easy Bean Salad","Healthy Lunch Salad"]}

{"Title":"Sheet Pan Meal Prep Chicken and Vegetables","Description":"An easy and customizable sheet pan meal perfect for weekly meal prep","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"25 minutes","TotalTime":"40 minutes","Notes":"Customize with your favorite vegetables and seasonings","Ingredients":["4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts","2 cups broccoli florets","2 cups sweet potato, cubed","1 red bell pepper, sliced","1 red onion, cut into wedges","3 tbsp olive oil","2 tsp Italian seasoning","1 tsp garlic powder","Salt and pepper to taste","Lemon wedges for serving"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper","In a small bowl, mix Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper","Place chicken breasts on one side of the baking sheet","Arrange vegetables on the other side of the sheet","Drizzle everything with olive oil and sprinkle with the seasoning mixture","Toss vegetables to coat evenly","Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender","Let cool slightly before dividing into meal prep containers","Serve with lemon wedges"]}

{"Title":"Nutrient-Dense Pregnancy Smoothie Bowl","Description":"A delicious and nutritious smoothie bowl packed with essential nutrients for expectant mothers","Servings":"1","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"10 minutes","Notes":"Consult with your healthcare provider about specific nutritional needs during pregnancy","Ingredients":["1 cup spinach","1 ripe banana","1/2 cup frozen berries","1/2 cup Greek yogurt","1 tbsp chia seeds","1 tbsp almond butter","1/4 cup milk of choice","1 scoop prenatal protein powder (optional)","Toppings: sliced almonds, fresh berries, granola"],"Directions":["Add spinach, banana, frozen berries, Greek yogurt, chia seeds, almond butter, milk, and protein powder (if using) to a blender","Blend until smooth and creamy","Pour into a bowl","Top with sliced almonds, fresh berries, and granola","Serve immediately"]}

{"Title":"Senior-Friendly High-Protein Chicken and Vegetable Soup","Description":"A nourishing and easy-to-eat soup tailored for seniors' nutritional needs","Servings":"6","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour","Notes":"Can be frozen in individual portions for easy reheating","Ingredients":["1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, diced","1 onion, finely chopped","2 carrots, diced","2 celery stalks, diced","2 cloves garlic, minced","1 cup frozen peas","1 cup small pasta (like orzo or small shells)","6 cups low-sodium chicken broth","1 tsp dried thyme","1 bay leaf","2 tbsp olive oil","Salt and pepper to taste","Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)"],"Directions":["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat","Add onion, carrots, and celery; cook until softened","Add garlic and cook for another minute","Add diced chicken and cook until no longer pink","Pour in chicken broth, add thyme and bay leaf","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes","Add pasta and frozen peas, cook for another 8-10 minutes until pasta is tender","Remove bay leaf and season with salt and pepper","Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley"]}

{"indexTitle":"Chicken Vegetable Soup","aliases":["Senior-Friendly High-Protein Chicken and Vegetable Soup","Chicken Vegetable Soup","Senior Nutrition Soup","Easy-to-Eat Chicken Soup","Protein-Rich Elderly Meal"]}

{"Title":"Toddler-Approved Veggie-Packed Mini Meatballs","Description":"Nutritious and kid-friendly meatballs with hidden vegetables","Servings":"24 mini meatballs","PrepTime":"20 minutes","CookTime":"20 minutes","TotalTime":"40 minutes","Notes":"Can be frozen for quick future meals","Ingredients":["1 lb lean ground beef","1 cup finely grated zucchini (excess water squeezed out)","1/2 cup finely grated carrot","1/4 cup finely chopped spinach","1/4 cup breadcrumbs","1 egg, beaten","1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese","1 tsp garlic powder","1 tsp onion powder","1/4 tsp salt (optional)","2 tbsp olive oil (for cooking)"],"Directions":["In a large bowl, mix ground beef, zucchini, carrot, spinach, breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt (if using)","Form the mixture into 24 small meatballs","Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat","Cook meatballs in batches, turning occasionally, until browned and cooked through (about 8-10 minutes per batch)","Alternatively, bake on a lined baking sheet at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes","Serve warm with your child's favorite dipping sauce"]}
{"indexTitle":"Mini Meatballs","aliases":["Toddler-Approved Veggie-Packed Mini Meatballs","Mini Meatballs","Hidden Veggie Meatballs","Kid-Friendly Meatballs","Nutritious Toddler Meal"]}

{"Title":"Low-Sodium Herb-Roasted Chicken and Vegetables","Description":"A flavorful, heart-healthy meal with minimal added salt","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"15 minutes","CookTime":"45 minutes","TotalTime":"1 hour","Notes":"Use fresh herbs for best flavor","Ingredients":["4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts","2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, zucchini), chopped","1 onion, cut into wedges","2 tbsp olive oil","2 tsp dried Italian herbs","1 tsp garlic powder","1 tsp paprika","1/4 tsp black pepper","1 lemon, juiced","Fresh herbs (rosemary, thyme, parsley) for garnish"],"Directions":["Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)","In a small bowl, mix dried herbs, garlic powder, paprika, and black pepper","Place chicken and vegetables in a large baking dish","Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice","Sprinkle herb mixture over chicken and vegetables, tossing to coat","Roast in the oven for 35-45 minutes, until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender","Garnish with fresh herbs before serving"]}

{"Title":"High-Calorie Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie for Weight Gain","Description":"A nutrient-dense smoothie designed to support healthy weight gain","Servings":"1","PrepTime":"5 minutes","CookTime":"0 minutes","TotalTime":"5 minutes","Notes":"Consult with a healthcare provider before starting a weight gain diet","Ingredients":["1 ripe banana","2 tbsp creamy peanut butter","1 cup whole milk","1/4 cup rolled oats","1 scoop vanilla protein powder","1 tbsp honey","1/2 tsp cinnamon","1 cup ice cubes"],"Directions":["Add banana, peanut butter, milk, oats, protein powder, honey, and cinnamon to a blender","Blend until smooth","Add ice cubes and blend again until thick and creamy","Pour into a glass and serve immediately"]}

{"Title":"20-Minute Instant Pot Beef and Broccoli","Description":"A quick and easy Chinese-inspired dish made in the Instant Pot","Servings":"4","PrepTime":"10 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"20 minutes","Notes":"Serve over rice or noodles for a complete meal","Ingredients":["1 lb flank steak, sliced thinly against the grain","4 cups broccoli florets","1/2 cup soy sauce","1/4 cup brown sugar","3 cloves garlic, minced","1 tbsp sesame oil","1 tbsp cornstarch","1/2 cup beef broth","2 tbsp vegetable oil","Sesame seeds for garnish"],"Directions":["Set Instant Pot to Sauté mode and add vegetable oil","Brown beef slices in batches, then remove and set aside","Mix soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, sesame oil, and beef broth in the pot","Return beef to the pot and close the lid","Cook on High pressure for 5 minutes, then quick release","Add broccoli and cornstarch slurry, set to Sauté mode","Cook for 2-3 minutes until broccoli is tender and sauce thickens","Garnish with sesame seeds and serve"]}

{"Title":"3-Ingredient Banana Pancakes","Description":"A simple and healthy breakfast option that's quick to make","Servings":"2","PrepTime":"5 minutes","CookTime":"10 minutes","TotalTime":"15 minutes","Notes":"Add chocolate chips or blueberries for extra flavor","Ingredients":["2 ripe bananas","2 eggs","1/4 cup rolled oats","Cooking spray or butter for griddle"],"Directions":["In a bowl, mash bananas with a fork","Add eggs and oats, mix well","Heat a non-stick griddle or pan over medium heat","Lightly grease with cooking spray or butter","Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake","Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form on top","Flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes","Serve warm with your favorite toppings"]}

{"Title":"5-Minute Microwave Quiche in a Mug","Description":"A single-serve quiche that's perfect for a quick breakfast or lunch","Servings":"1","PrepTime":"3 minutes","CookTime":"2 minutes","TotalTime":"5 minutes","Notes":"Experiment with different mix-ins like spinach, cheese, or ham","Ingredients":["1 large egg","3 tbsp milk","1/4 cup shredded cheese","2 tbsp diced bell pepper","2 tbsp diced onion","Salt and pepper to taste","1 tbsp chopped fresh herbs (optional)"],"Directions":["In a microwave-safe mug, whisk together egg and milk","Stir in cheese, bell pepper, onion, salt, pepper, and herbs","Microwave on high for 1 minute","Check and microwave in 15-second intervals until egg is set","Let cool for 1 minute before eating"]}
